credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Fan leaf
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: deflected element work with overcasting and looping; buttonhole, overcast cord, stem, satin, chain, looping, darning, surface satin, and herringbone embroidery stitches on plain weave
description: A pastoral scene with a shepherd and animals, a barn and a tree; flanked by large cornucopias from which spill floral sprays in scrolling patterns, two symmetrically placed birds and two large praying mantises. In the Swiss Appenzell style.
name: Fan leaf
